about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers that the upcoming road will curve right, followed by a curve to the left. Drivers should adjust their speed to safely continue on the road.

comment.text: Road construction ahead.

suggestedAnswer.text: The road ahead curves left then right.

comment.text: The road ahead curves left then right.

suggestedAnswer.text: The road ahead curves right then left.

comment.text: The road ahead curves right then left.

acceptedAnswer.text: The road ahead curves right then left.

comment.text: The road ahead curves right then left.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers that the upcoming road will curve right, followed by a curve to the left. Drivers should adjust their speed to safely continue on the road.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign warns drivers that the upcoming road will curve right, followed by a curve to the left. Drivers should adjust their speed to safely continue on the road.

hasPart.name: Which of the following driving skills are affected by the use of alcohol and/or drugs?

about.name: Which of the following driving skills are affected by the use of alcohol and/or drugs?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following driving skills are affected by the use of alcohol and/or drugs? | Which of the following driving skills are affected by the use of alcohol and/or drugs? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Any amount of alcohol acts as a depressant, slowing the function of the nervous system. It will reduce a person's alertness and ability to concentrate, increase their reaction time, and drastically reduce their coordination.

comment.text: Alertness and concentration.
Reaction time and coordination.
All of the above.
All of the above.

answerExplanation.text: Any amount of alcohol acts as a depressant, slowing the function of the nervous system. It will reduce a person's alertness and ability to concentrate, increase their reaction time, and drastically reduce their coordination.

comment.text: Which of the following driving skills are affected by the use of alcohol and/or drugs? | Any amount of alcohol acts as a depressant, slowing the function of the nervous system. It will reduce a person's alertness and ability to concentrate, increase their reaction time, and drastically reduce their coordination.

hasPart.name: You must yield the right-of-way to an emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights by:

about.name: You must yield the right-of-way to an emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights by:

hasPart.assesses: You must yield the right-of-way to an emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights by: | You must yield the right-of-way to an emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights by: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must yield the right-of-way to any emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights. Do this by driving to the right edge of the road and stopping, taking care not to stop in an intersection. You may move again after the emergency vehicle has passed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Driving as closely to the right edge of the road as possible and stopping.

comment.text: Driving as closely to the right edge of the road as possible and stopping.

suggestedAnswer.text: Moving into the right lane and driving slowly until it has passed.

comment.text: Moving into the right lane and driving slowly until it has passed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stopping immediately, even if you are within an intersection.

comment.text: Stopping immediately, even if you are within an intersection.

acceptedAnswer.text: Driving as closely to the right edge of the road as possible and stopping.

comment.text: Driving as closely to the right edge of the road as possible and stopping.

answerExplanation.text: You must yield the right-of-way to any emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights. Do this by driving to the right edge of the road and stopping, taking care not to stop in an intersection. You may move again after the emergency vehicle has passed.

comment.text: You must yield the right-of-way to an emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights by: | You must yield the right-of-way to any emergency vehicle that is using its siren and flashing lights. Do this by driving to the right edge of the road and stopping, taking care not to stop in an intersection. You may move again after the emergency vehicle has passed.

hasPart.name: If a tire blows out, you should:

about.name: If a tire blows out, you should:

hasPart.assesses: If a tire blows out, you should: | If a tire blows out, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, hold the steering wheel tightly and keep the vehicle going straight.You should slow down gradually, taking your foot off the gas pedal and using the brakes lightly. Do not stop on the road if at all possible. Pull off the road in a safe place.

suggestedAnswer.text: Apply the brake and hold it.

comment.text: Apply the brake and hold it.

suggestedAnswer.text: Hold the steering wheel tightly and use the brakes lightly.

comment.text: Hold the steering wheel tightly and use the brakes lightly.
Pull over quickly.

acceptedAnswer.text: Hold the steering wheel tightly and use the brakes lightly.

comment.text: Hold the steering wheel tightly and use the brakes lightly.

answerExplanation.text: If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, hold the steering wheel tightly and keep the vehicle going straight.You should slow down gradually, taking your foot off the gas pedal and using the brakes lightly. Do not stop on the road if at all possible. Pull off the road in a safe place.

comment.text: If a tire blows out, you should: | If a tire suddenly blows out while you are driving, hold the steering wheel tightly and keep the vehicle going straight.You should slow down gradually, taking your foot off the gas pedal and using the brakes lightly. Do not stop on the road if at all possible. Pull off the road in a safe place.
